about_the_game:
JumpKin Adventure Begins!

Step into a sweet but competitive world! Are you ready to challenge your friends with your pumpkin characters? This colorful, energetic platformer is both fun and strategy at the same time!

Choose from more than 10 different characters with unique designs. Which pumpkin will you choose? Choose the map, set the game time and let the game begin!

Pumpkin Smash Mode: Collect the scattered fruits on the map to earn the most points. Sounds simple, right? But when friendly competition is involved, things can get complicated. Everyone plays with their own strategy! Jump, run, quickly explore the map and collect objects. The more points you collect, the more you'll want to win, but you also have to be careful of other players! If one of your opponents suddenly jumps on you, you may lose a point you were earning.

Great Powers Await You! Gain an advantage by collecting power-ups hidden on the map! But these powers are random and limited, so getting the right power at the right time will be part of your strategy. For example

Invisibility: You can become invisible in the map and score points without getting caught by your opponents.

Double Jump: Get one step ahead of your opponents by easily overcoming obstacles!

Fast Run: Nothing can stop you; lightning across the map with your speed.

Shield: Strengthen your defense and you won't lose points even if your opponents jump at you!

But watch out! You already have a duration of special powers. Plan your strategy accordingly and make your move at the right time to outmaneuver your opponents!

In the end, whoever scores more points will win! But it's not just about winning; it's also about who laughs the most and makes the best memories in this fun and action-packed adventure!

The most enjoyable way to spend time with your friends, compete and have fun is waiting for you in JumpKin Adventure.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: JumpKin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7 or later 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Think you're the best pumpkin? Being a pumpkin isn't for everyone. So join the competition with your friends in this addictive 2D platformer. It's time to immerse yourself in the JumpKin challenge!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
